com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.builder

Interface LoaderChannelBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelConfigurableBuilder<LoaderChannelBuilder>, LoaderConfigurableBuilder<LoaderChannelBuilder>

    public interface LoaderChannelBuilder
extends ChannelConfigurableBuilder<LoaderChannelBuilder>, LoaderConfigurableBuilder<LoaderChannelBuilder>
    Interface defining a builder of output channels bound to loader invocations.
    In order to be successfully bound, the specific routine invocation must have a user defined ID and still be running (or cached) at the time of the channel creation.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 01/14/2015.

    See Also:
    LoaderRoutineBuilder
